snippet: Witnesses and officials said at least four people were killed and scores wounded in a bombing outside an expensive hotel in Mogadishu.
abstract: Car loaded with explosives blows up outside hotel in Mogadishu, Somalia, killing between 4 and 11 people and wounding many more; blast appears to have been carried out by militant group Shabab.
lead_paragraph: Witnesses and officials said at least four people were killed and scores wounded in a bombing outside an expensive hotel in Mogadishu.

headline.main: Deadly Blast Hits Hotel in Somalia
